first-round series.`` He was on fire,'' Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston. Anytime a guy like that is on fire, there's very little you can do except to take the ball out of his hands. It's right up there with Michael Beasley 's 63. He just had a great night. The NBA saw some superlative performances over the opening weekend of the playoffs, but the best came in the last game. President Bush . He served as Defense secretary and chief of staff to Gerald Ford and again led the Pentagon during the second President Bush presidency. Donald Rumsfeld was unapologetic about his leadership of the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the al Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said. As in his book, Donald Rumsfeld was forthcoming with his criticism of public figures, including his fellow President Bush Cabinet members. residence when the Gillibrands and their two young sons are in the Capital Region.`` The Senator just wanted to be closer to her family,'' Kirsten Gillibrand spokeswoman Bethany Lesser said Friday. The home is within minutes of her family. Kirsten Gillibrand 's parents, siblings, nieces and nephews live in the Capital Region. The house has five bedrooms, three baths and a tennis court. that California could be forced to issue IOUs as early as April or May if state lawmakers don't make deep spending cuts soon. Bill Lockyer , a Democrat, said that if lawmakers don't adopt a timely budget that addresses the substantial shortfall in current accounts, we will run out of money to pay the bills either in this fiscal year or shortly into the new one. The treasurer made the comments at a political conference hosted by the University of California, Berkeley Institute for Governmental Studies. Bernie Sanders , a standard-bearer for the American Left, acknowledged to AFP this week that Ronald Reagan `` was a very warm individual'' who`` connected with the American people.'' But I think many of the policies that he developed did a great deal of disservice to the middle class and working families of this country. And I think we can learn from those serious policy errors and hopefully not continue, said Sen. Bernie Sanders . Article: Ronald Reagan legacy weighed amid 100th birthday events...
